detaileddescription.para: The configuration file of RteLight is located in the RteLight\{Variant}.xml The architect needs to update information like the list of cores, and networks. The data stored there have to be aligned with BSW integrators as well as with Routintg engine team. In order to generate the rte code the integrator just needs to run the build.bat without any parameters from the RteLight/RteTool/(1/Evo)/tools folder. However in order to configure an SWC in the RteLight several steps are required. Step 0 - Clone the SWC is not already done. Step 1. - Map the XSDs to the correct SST tabs Step 2. - Export to XML Step 3. - Adapt the TEMPLATE_NameTransformation.xml Step 4. - Adapt the TEMPLATE_SwcConfig.xml

Once the steps described above are realied, the integrator just needs to run the build.bat. Please do not forget: check in ALL the files you have changed durring the generation. In order to shorten the time to integrate a new SWC, it is possible to "clone" an SWC template. To do so the integrator has to run the swcInitalDeploy.py from sw.sys.chorus_main_doc/mc_sw/RteLight/SwcTemplate/c/tools. An "in tool help" is already avaiable and maintained there. The options are available by running the tool without parameters.
